__e: My brother poisoned my DNA, I know, I am not a fool.
She made everyone believe that I poisoned my father... but it was her.
You killed my husband. Now your pet's poisoned my son.
That man poisoned his own father, he killed his own brother.
He figured out the truth but he couldn't tell a soul because you poisoned his tea too.
Are you telling me that that child poisoned his own father?
She ruined my father's life. Oh, yeah.
And I'm sorry I had to burden you with this stuff.
That's for being a shit and for ruining my daughter's life.
I don't want him to be poisoned by it.
If he was poisoned by a chef, it had to have been something he consumed in the 24 hours leading up to his death.
Your uncle has brought me evidence that my son was poisoned by his wife.
So, what, this guy was shot and poisoned?
Last time you needed my help, I ended up poisoned, and you did nothing.
He's been poisoned and I think we both know who did it.
Or all y'all is... But only one of you poisoned the coffy.
Someone put poison in the glass of the husband and she it drank.
That still don't get us no closer... To which one of y'all poisoned the coffy, though.
